snippet: The jab was aimed at Mitt Romney's comment earlier in the week that he did not worry about the "very poor" because they could rely on a government safety net.
abstract: The jab was aimed at Mitt Romney's comment earlier in the week that he did not worry about the "very poor" because they could rely on a government safety net.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS -- Newt Gingrich introduced a variation to his long-running attack on Mitt Romney as insufficiently conservative on Friday, saying that if "Obama is big food stamp,'' Mr. Romney is "little food stamp.''

headline.main: Gingrich Says Romney Is  'Little Food Stamp'
